tool_description: An API showing all the latest sport news around the world .
name: Sport News
title: Sport News

api_list.name: Get the  sport news from a specific source
api_list.description: This endpoint gets the data from skysports
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sport-news2.p.rapidapi.com/news/skysports"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sport-news2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://sport-news2.p.rapidapi.com/news/{sportnews}"

headers = {

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sport-news2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get the sport news from a specific source

api_list.name: Get all sport news
